com.mlt.desktop

Class Alert

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mlt.desktop.Alert

  • public class Alert
extends java.lang.Object
    An alert dialog that supports the standard PLAIN, INFORMATION, WARNING, CONFIRMATION and ERROR configurations, with some predefined buttons. The image is laid out in the left and the content is a text pane. If the text is an HTML text, the pane is set a content type "text/html", if not, the default content type is "text/plain".
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
